Embrace the darkness with the retro inspired RPG Stygian: Reign of the Old Ones. Play great games and help support nPower and The Global Foodbanking Network with your purchase!

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support nPower and The Global Foodbanking Network. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

throughthewoods.callout:
72% Positive on Steam

Unravel the mystery of a mother and her missing son in this third-person Norse themed Horror game
throughthewoods.description_text:
Through the Woods is a third-person Norse horror adventure set in a forest on the western shores of Norway that tells the story of a mother and her missing son. Through reactive narration, the player experiences the mother’s re-telling of the events surrounding her son’s disappearance. Players follow the path of a terrified woman who has forced herself to enter this terrible place for the sole purpose of finding her son, in a setting heavily influenced by Norse mythology and Norwegian folk tales.

With Through the Woods, Antagonist have captured the feeling of the forest as they saw it as children, with all the fear and mystery that comes from roaming through it alone. This is coupled with a powerful story and high quality sound design, which in the darkness of the forest becomes a core mechanic. Through the Woods is a profound experience that directly delivers the feelings of loneliness and loss in a terrifying place...


FEATURES
  • Explore stunning environments and experience stories inspired by Norse mythology, Norwegian art and nature
  • Uncover dark tales of the past and present through reactive narration
  • Creative use of light and darkness generates deceptive environments
  • A frightening journey accompanied by beautiful and grim sound design


ABOUT US

Antagonist is a small independent game studio based in Oslo, Norway, founded in 2014. The team is focused on creating narrative-driven titles with epic stories and great gameplay.

globalfoodbankingnetwork.description_text:
Donations to support The Global Foodbanking Network are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The Global FoodBanking Network’s (GFN) mission is to nourish the world’s hungry through uniting and advancing food banks. GFN unites and empowers organizations that support those in need by reducing food waste and cultivating sustainable relationships that save lives.

stygian_reignoftheoldones.human_name: Stygian: Reign of the Old Ones
stygian_reignoftheoldones.callout:
67% Positive on Steam

Experience the classic Lovecraftian RPG before its prequel launches on April 14, 2025!
stygian_reignoftheoldones.description_text:
In Stygian: Reign of the Old Ones, the player journeys from a doomed Arkham into the depths of the Abyss. Create your own character based on 1920's archetypes and carve a path through a broken and mysterious world.

Your desperate battle against forces beyond comprehension will haunt you until the end. Physical combat will be challenging, spellcasting will have dire consequences, and your sanity will be strained to the breaking point by unknown abominations. Sometimes the best solution will be to flee what lurks beyond the threshold.

Features:
  • A hand drawn 2D world reflecting Lovecraft's themes of cosmic horror and dread.
  • Enemies, environments and storylines inspired by Lovecraft’s iconic original works. Take part in quests inspired by your favorite stories and see them play out according to your own decisions and role-playing style.
  • Choose from 8 main character Archetypes, each with its own origin backstory and specialties.
  • A host of weird companions will accompany you on your ill-starred journey: the lonely, antediluvian 'Outsider', a fallen soldier of the Great War reanimated by Herbert West. Recruit these and other outlandish beings to your crew.
  • Your character's Sanity and mental state will influence dialogue options. Mental illness comes with advantages as well as hindrances. Sometimes it pays to be mad in a world gone mad!
  • Stygian's Belief System determines how your characters cope with the warped reality of the new Arkham, as well as the rate at which they regenerate lost Sanity. Belief Systems also offer unique dialogue options, expanding the breadth of role-playing possibilities.
  • A new kind of spell system which sometimes takes more than it gives. Being a master of the occult is not as simple as flinging colored missiles from your fingertips. The black magic of Stygian is potent but may cost you your mind, your health, and possibly even much more.
  • Strategic, turn-based combat from a 2D perspective, similar to the classic Heroes of Might and Magic games.
  • The struggle in Stygian is not to save the world, for that battle is lost already. Pursue your own goals in these end times: salvation, vendetta, or perhaps something darker.

forgivemefather.callout:
87% Positive on Steam

Run and gun through this Lovecraftian, comic book styled Boomer Shooter
forgivemefather.description_text:
As the only one left with full senses, you embark on a journey in search of answers and relief in this FPS game that is created in a distinctive retro horror comic book style and feels as if it came straight out of Lovecraft's books.

Be aware of your madness level which dynamically changes during gameplay and gives you additional power. Choose your active skills depending on your play style and use them to fight against the eternal evil.

Explore this Lovecraft-inspired world that is full of hidden and hard to reach areas, and uncover the entire story to solve the mystery of this crazy place.

  • Feeling of a classic FPS from the 90s
    Timelapse animations, opponents and elements of 2D in a 3D environment; first aid kits and life points, non-reloading weapons, powerups during dynamic combat with numerous opponents.

  • Custom combat experience
    With scripture in one hand and weapons powered by an unknown substance in the other, the player will face the challenge of maintaining their humanity. It is up to the player to decide how their equipment evolves, and to find ways of defeating hordes of unpredictable opponents.

  • Dynamic level of madness
    Directly influencing not only the audio-visual experience, but the gameplay itself, its effect varies depending on the current level of player’s madness.

  • The gameplay is presented in a comic book style
    Hand-drawn graphics designed to maintain a distinctive comic book look, where any screenshot from the game could be a part of a new comic book.

  • Mood straight from Lovecraft's dark novels
    All throughout the game, the player will feel the atmosphere of dread and horror that the works of H.P. Lovecraft are renowned for. Surrounded by the occult and forces of eternal evil, experience the feelings of hopelessness, madness and confusion, and the burning need to find answers and bring back some semblance of reason and sanity to the world.

  • Many climatic levels and varied bestiary
    A diverse world entirely made by hand, full of interesting enemies ranging from possessed inhabitants to monsters straight out of your worst nightmares.

  • Two heroes to choose from
    Each with their own, unique development tree. Experience the story from the perspective of either a priest or a journalist.

wrath_aeonofruin.callout:
85% Positive on Steam

Decimate your enemies 90's style, powered by Quake-1 Tech
wrath_aeonofruin.description_text:
You are Outlander. Once adrift upon the Ageless Sea, you now find yourself on the shores of a dying world. From the consuming darkness emerges a figure cloaked in white, the Shepherd of Wayward Souls, who burdens you with the task of hunting down the remaining Guardians of the Old World. You must journey into the vast gloom to explore ancient ruins, discover forgotten secrets and battle the horrors that lurk within.

Fueled by legendary Quake 1 technology, the veins of WRATH pump with the DNA of revered '90s shooters. WRATH embraces the timeless elements of classic titles such as DOOM, QUAKE, DUKE NUKEM 3D, BLOOD, UNREAL and HEXEN and carries them into the 21st century.

Equipped with weapons of exceptional might and an inventory of powerful artifacts, you must traverse ancient crypts, sunken ruins, corrupted temples and howling forests to bring death to your enemies. But do not underestimate your adversaries, for they are great in power and number. Your mind must be as sharp as your blade if you hope to survive the dangers ahead.

The world of WRATH is rich with engaging combat, diverse environments and captivating lore. Every element is deftly intertwined to create an authentic and enchanting experience as timeless as the games that inspired it.

• Explore a vast world shrouded in darkness, passionately crafted by the hands of expert Quake scene necromancers.

• Forge your path with an arsenal of deadly weapons , each with multiple fire modes.

• Know your enemy . Many horrors lurk in the shadows, thirsting for your blood.

• Artifacts of great power lay hidden in the dark places of the world. Find them and dominate your enemies.

• Powered by the Legendary Quake 1 Tech , WRATH is an authentic, classic FPS in every way.

• Immerse yourself in haunting music born from the twisted mind of Andrew Hulshult (Quake Champions, Rise of the Triad, Dusk and Amid Evil).

dreadtemplar.callout:
94% Positive on Steam

Get your revenge in this "fast-paced hardcore old-school" FPS!
dreadtemplar.description_text:
Dread Templar is a fast-paced first-person shooter that combines elements from both modern retro shooters and classics from the 90s. You are a Dread Templar seeking his revenge deep in the evil realm. Explore the levels and solve puzzles to find hidden weapons and upgrades. Face hordes of demons and bloodthirsty fiends using ninja equipment, firearms, and infernal weapons that will make YOU the scariest thing in hell. Gain Dread Powers and customize your skills according to your playstyle, as they will help you in your battle against the dark forces.

Features:
  • Dread Templar uses elements from both modern retro FPS and classic shooters such as fast-paced gameplay, dashing, headshots and bullet time so you can enjoy the old-school shooting games in a modern way!
  • Customize your weapon skills to fit your own playstyle and fight against the demon hordes.
  • More than 10 types of weapons in the game including katana swords, firearms and infernal guns!
  • Explore side areas and secret places, solve interesting puzzles and get rewards.
  • Handmade retro art style - all elements in the game including weapons, demons, and levels are done in a retro pixel art style reminiscent of the 90s shooters.

viscerafest.callout:
93% Positive on Steam

Blast your way through 23 levels of Sci-fi Arena combat
viscerafest.description_text:
THE STORY

The year is 3796, and you are Caroline. A bloodthirsty, psychopathic mercenary who wants nothing more than to marry her wonderful boyfriend Athens Fetter. Problem is money's tight, and rings aren't exactly cheap. But thankfully there may be hope for her yet, as a warlock named Cromune has acquired a rather hefty bounty on his head. He's being accompanied by a small fraction of the U.S.C. (The United Scientific Conglomerate) Lead by Dr Mortice. Which means he's got a small army defending him. But what's an army to someone who's taken on a legion? What're a few hundred soldiers to death incarnate? Nothing but a slaughter... Nay... A viscerafest.

KEY FEATURES

Navigate nonlinear hand-crafted levels, stuffed to the brim with secrets, using key cards, completing puzzles and various objectives to progress. Set across a wide variety of locations, from a space station above the earth, to a realm beyond our reality.

Wield 9 unique and powerful weapons, from staples of the genre like the bunker buster double-barreled shotgun, to the more unique and offbeat, such as the Pung Cannon.

Slaughter over 2 dozen different enemy types, from the minor grunts who make up the U.S.C's forces, to monsters beyond your ability to comprehend such as The Soul Hunters. New enemy types are introduced every level, each compounding the challenges you'll face with a variety of attacks and behaviors.

Juggle your resources, as you fight to stay alive, constantly balancing your use of ammo, health, and armor.

Move at the speed of light, chaining bunny hopping and dashing together to move at speeds no man would dream of, and with your overbearing air control, dance around projectiles like no other.

Collect tons of goodies to unlock items such as Cypher keys, and level modifiers to spice up your playthroughs.

developers.developer-name: Acid Man Games, Fire Plant Games

fellseal_arbitersmark.callout:
90% Positive on Steam

Venture forth in this Tactical RPG with your custom band of Arbiters
fellseal_arbitersmark.description_text:
Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark is a story-driven, turn-based tactical RPG set in a fantasy world with a touch of steampunk. Take control of the Arbiter Kyrie, an agent of the Immortal Council tasked with preserving stability and order throughout the land, and lead your troops through difficult encounters.

Features:
  • Experience an epic and mature story , unfolding through over 40 story encounters and topped with challenging end-game content.
  • Classic tactical combat battles , with rugged terrain and elevation, taking place on beautiful hand-drawn environments.
  • A deep and complex class system with over 30 classes and 300 abilities lets you truly customize every one of your characters through the selection of their class, sub-class and passives. Carefully craft the character you envision, be it a versatile generalist, a dedicated spell-caster or a mighty foe-crushing specialist!
  • Customize your troops' appearance your way, by selecting their portrait, outfit, colors and overall visuals from a wide selection.
  • Equip your army with over 240 pieces of equipment, either purchased, gathered from fallen enemies or created from crafting.

Story:

Centuries ago, a brutal beast of destruction rent the world asunder. In this time of need, the first Immortals came into their uncanny powers, powers so great that they succeeded in destroying the beast ravaging the land, where all else had failed.

To prevent such destruction from ever happening again, the Immortals banded together to form a Council that would enforce order and stability on a global scale, stepping in at any hint of war or chaos.

The Immortals might be vastly powerful, but they are few. Even they can't oversee all of the lands. This is why they rely upon their mortal agents, the Arbiters, to guard the land's people from the more day-to-day dangers they face. Arbiters range over the land, rooting out bandits, unruly monsters, and crooked officials; their word is law.

But one Arbiter uncovers the deepening corruption pervading her own order, and it falls to her to halt the spread of a threat as dire as the brutal beast of yore.

Gameplay:

Strongly influenced by games such as Final Fantasy Tactics (original and Advance versions) and Tactics Ogre, this tactical RPG stands on its own as a worthy successor of those classics, bringing a slew of improvements and additions to the tactics genre.

With hot courses like Winning at Sales and Managing Conflict—the Humble Skills Hub: Get That Promotion Bundle is a one-stop-shop for go-getters. This 20+ course bundle will give you the knowledge you seek to take your career in sales, marketing, and more to the next level. Take your passion for productivity and growth to a new frontier and help support Alzheimer's Research UK with your purchase.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Big promotions only a bundle away
basic_data.description:
Big promotions only a bundle away. The Growth Mindset should be at the forefront of every career-minded individual. With hot courses like Winning at Sales and Managing Conflict—the Humble Skills Hub: Get That Promotion Bundle is a one-stop-shop for go-getters. This 20+ course bundle will give you the knowledge you seek to take your career in sales, marketing, and more to the next level. Take your passion for productivity and growth to a new frontier and help support Alzheimer's Research UK with your purchase.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $1,339. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. All keys can be redeemed on the Packt website.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support a charity of your choice. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

personalskills.description_text: Dive into the essential personal skills every manager needs to excel in their role. This course begins with an exploration of SMART goals, helping you set clear and achievable objectives. You’ll then learn to define and model excellence within your team, building a strong foundation for success. As you progress, discover strategies to build self-confidence, fight procrastination, and create a personal development plan tailored to your growth.nManaging day-to-day tasks becomes effortless as you learn to take control of your emails and maintain focus through effective body language and word choice. The course also addresses unique challenges, such as developing assertiveness for shy or introverted individuals and how to assert yourself with your boss. By incorporating physical activity, like a lunchtime walk, you’ll enhance your productivity and well-being.nSelf-awareness and interpersonal skills are key traits of successful managers. This course guides you through understanding your learning style, effectively communicating your personal abilities, and raising concerns appropriately. Finally, you’ll explore the concept of mindsets and master the art of managing up, ensuring strong rapport with your managers and paving the way for professional growth.

feedbackskills.description_text: In our Feedback Skills course, you will embark on a journey to master the essential communication skill of delivering and receiving feedback. The course begins with understanding the structure of negative feedback, focusing on making it constructive and effective. You will then explore best practices for both giving and receiving feedback, ensuring you can see from the recipient's perspective to enhance mutual understanding.nAs you progress, you'll dive into techniques that ensure your feedback remains constructive and motivating, promoting continuous improvement. The course also addresses the emotional responses people may have when receiving feedback, equipping you with strategies to navigate these emotions effectively. Key principles of great feedback are uncovered, emphasizing their role in driving personal and team development.nFinally, the course covers various feedback mechanisms, providing you with tools to track performance and guide future improvements. By the end of this course, you'll be proficient in providing quality feedback that empowers and inspires others, making you an effective leader and communicator.

alzheimersresearchuk.description_text:
Without effective treatments, one in three children born today will die with dementia. Today, there are no dementia survivors but research can change this.

Alzheimer’s Research UK is the UK's leading dementia research charity, dedicated to causes, diagnosis, prevention, treatment and cure. Backed by our passionate scientists and supporters, we’re challenging the way people think about dementia, uniting the big thinkers in the field and funding the innovative science that will deliver a cure.

assertivenessskills.description_text: Mastering assertiveness is a critical skill for professional success, enabling clear, confident, and respectful communication. This course begins with foundational techniques, such as basic, empathic, self-disclosure, discrepancy, and consequence assertiveness, guiding you on when and how to apply them effectively. You'll learn to embody the traits of assertive leadership, enhancing your ability to lead with confidence and clarity.nnNext, the course delves into strategies for transforming workplace negativity into positivity, ensuring a harmonious and productive environment. You'll gain skills to assertively say no, maintaining professional relationships and morale. Handling aggression assertively is another key focus, providing tools to build your resilience and communication strength in the face of confrontational situations.nnThe course also addresses the unique challenges faced by shy and introverted individuals, offering methods to express assertiveness confidently. Lastly, you'll learn how to assert yourself with your boss, ensuring your voice is heard and respected in hierarchical settings. By the end of this course, you will possess a comprehensive set of assertiveness skills applicable to various professional scenarios.

excelessentials.description_text: Dive into Excel Essentials and transform your data analysis skills. Starting with Conditional Formatting, you will learn how to highlight key data points, manage rules, and visualize data with color scales and icon sets. The course then explores advanced filtering techniques, including text, number, and date filters, ensuring you can quickly sift through large datasets. Learn to remove duplicates, outline data, and find unique values, enhancing your data accuracy and presentation.nProgressing to sorting techniques, you’ll discover how to organize data by various criteria, use custom sort orders, and even randomize lists. The course also covers essential cell formatting, including merging cells, wrapping text, and adjusting decimal places for precise data presentation. Printing essentials such as setting page breaks and formatting print areas are also detailed, ensuring your spreadsheets are print-ready.nIn workbook management, you’ll master the ribbon, protect your files with passwords, and safeguard specific sheets and cells from unauthorized changes. Learn to use the Quick Access Toolbar, understand workbook themes, and recover unsaved work. The final sections focus on worksheets, covering viewing multiple sheets, spell checking, freezing panes, and consolidating data across sheets for comprehensive data management.

presentationskillswithstorytelling.description_text: In this course, you will embark on a journey to master presentation skills and storytelling for business. The first section focuses on essential techniques to overcome presentation jitters, craft powerful introductions, and create visually appealing presentations. You'll learn to plan and structure your presentations effectively, ensuring your message is clear and engaging.nThe second section delves into the art of storytelling in a business context. You'll discover how to connect with and engage your audience through powerful narratives. The course covers a model to follow for impactful storytelling, the key elements that make stories compelling, and the significant benefits storytelling brings to modern business communication.nBy the end of the course, you'll be equipped with practical tools and strategies to deliver presentations with confidence and tell stories that resonate with your audience. Whether you're presenting to a team, pitching ideas, or sharing new products, these skills will enhance your ability to communicate effectively and leave a lasting impression.

performancemanagement.description_text: In this course, you will explore a variety of performance management techniques designed to elevate your team’s productivity and morale. Each session focuses on a specific aspect of performance management, providing actionable insights and practical methods to implement in your daily managerial tasks. From conducting effective one-to-one meetings to handling consistent lateness, you will gain the tools needed to address common workplace challenges.nUnderstanding how to motivate team members and gain their commitment is crucial for any manager. This course offers models and techniques to inspire your team, ensuring they are driven to achieve their goals. You will also learn how to manage employees who are older or more experienced than yourself, navigating potential challenges with confidence and respect.nHandling poor performance can be daunting, but this course breaks down the process into manageable steps. You will learn to analyze performance issues, hold constructive performance management chats, and use models like AUCCC and SCOPE to guide these conversations. By the end of the course, you will be equipped with the knowledge and skills to foster a high-performance team environment.

negotiationskills.description_text: In this course, you'll master essential negotiation skills for personal and professional success. We begin with fundamental techniques, teaching you to apply negotiation strategies in various contexts. You'll learn to renegotiate deadlines effectively, explore five negotiation styles, and understand how to handle different personalities. This foundational knowledge sets the stage for becoming a more effective negotiator.nNext, the course delves into negotiation preparation. You'll learn to establish objectives, plan strategies, and identify limits. Understanding your Walk-Away Point (WAP) and Best Alternative to a Negotiated Agreement (BATNA) is crucial, ensuring profitable deals. The importance of being a skilled negotiator is emphasized, showing how it contributes to closing deals that maintain company margins.nFinally, the course covers the five stages of successful negotiation. From thorough planning to managing discussions and proposing solutions, each stage includes actionable steps. You'll discover key principles of effective bargaining and learn to summarize deals and reach agreements confidently. By understanding the four possible outcomes of a negotiation, you'll be equipped to aim for the best deal in any scenario. This approach ensures you achieve successful outcomes and enhance your negotiation capabilities.

financefornon-finance.description_text: In this comprehensive course, you'll embark on a journey to understand finance tailored for non-financial professionals. Starting with the basics, explore the differences between capital and revenue expenditures and delve into cost behavior. With clear explanations and practical examples, you'll learn to build and manage budgets effectively.nAs you progress, uncover the fundamental principles of accountancy and finance, learning common financial terms and the intricacies of financial statements. From the DNA of balance sheets, cash flow statements, and profit & loss statements, to the effects of depreciation and the importance of working capital, each video builds your confidence in navigating financial data. Discover how to conduct ratio analysis, variance analysis, and reforecasting, ensuring you can review your company’s performance critically.nBy the end of the course, you will have a solid understanding of cash flow, budgeting, financial forecasting, and the distinction between finance and funding. This course not only teaches you the theory but also provides practical insights into reviewing and controlling costs, keeping financial records, and leveraging data analysis for business decisions. Empower yourself to positively impact your organization's financial health.

leadershipandmanagement.description_text: Unlock your potential as an effective leader and manager with our expertly crafted video course. This course begins with foundational concepts, helping you assess your role as a model and the consistency of your leadership. Through engaging lessons, you will learn to build trust within your team and manage relationships with former peers, ensuring a harmonious and productive work environment.nDelve deeper into the nuances of leadership versus management, exploring distinct techniques and identifying which style suits different situations. The course also addresses practical issues such as managing absences and understanding contemporary motivations through Maslow's Hierarchy. You will gain insights into the five dysfunctions of a team and discover various managerial styles, helping you adapt your approach to maximize team potential.nAs you progress, you will explore advanced topics such as decision-making, organizational governance, and strategic planning. Learn to foster a positive organizational culture and uphold ethical standards, while also mastering operational management models. This comprehensive course ensures you are well-equipped to lead with confidence and drive organizational success.

handlingdifficultconversations.description_text: In today’s fast-paced world, navigating difficult conversations is an invaluable skill. This comprehensive course equips you to approach challenging situations with confidence and clarity. Start by building your assertiveness in the face of aggressive behavior and learn how to close difficult conversations while maintaining healthy relationships. Master the nuanced art of delivering bad news to ensure your message is understood and not dismissed.nGain insights into handling difficult people, a crucial aspect of any leadership role. The course provides strategies to deal with challenging individuals, helping you stay composed and focused on positive outcomes. Learn a four-step process for holding difficult conversations effectively, ensuring clear and comfortable communication.nPreparation is key, and this course emphasizes the importance of planning your conversations to deliver difficult messages effectively. Understand why difficult conversations are inevitable for leaders and how they can be beneficial. With real-world examples and practical techniques, you’ll be able to apply these skills immediately in your professional life, enhancing your ability to manage tough interactions successfully.

managingconflict.description_text: Effective conflict management is crucial for any successful team. This course begins with identifying and addressing blame culture in the workplace, empowering managers to create a positive and accountable environment. You will learn to spot the early signs of a blame culture and understand the steps necessary to eradicate it, ensuring a harmonious team dynamic.nNext, the course delves into the key skills required to handle conflict with finesse. From communication strategies to emotional intelligence, you will explore what it takes to navigate disputes constructively. The practical techniques taught in this section will enable you to manage conflicts without damaging relationships, maintaining a cohesive and productive team.nFinally, the course introduces the Thomas-Kilmann model, presenting five distinct conflict resolution options. Through detailed explanations and real-world examples, you will learn how to apply each method effectively. By the end of the course, you will be equipped to resolve conflicts efficiently, fostering a collaborative and respectful work environment.

introductiontosales.description_text: Dive into the world of sales with our comprehensive course designed to enhance your selling skills. Starting with an understanding of pain and pleasure in sales interactions, you will learn how to integrate benefits and risks effectively to close deals. The course will guide you through essential planning and preparation techniques to ensure you are always ready to make the sale, preventing any potential disasters.nAs you progress, you will discover what constitutes a truly effective sales interaction, exploring the steps needed to guide your prospects to their ideal solutions. The course delves into the critical aspects of asking for the sale and overcoming objections, providing you with the confidence to handle any resistance. You will also learn why push selling is ineffective and how pulling information from your prospects can significantly boost your success rates.nFinally, the course covers the importance of follow-up, understanding the differences between benefits and features, and identifying the characteristics of the modern-day buyer. You will explore the sales process in depth and learn to balance emotion and logic to influence your prospects effectively. By the end of the course, you will be equipped with the knowledge and skills to navigate and succeed in any sales interaction.

managingtimeandstress.description_text: In today's demanding work environment, managing time and stress is essential for maintaining productivity and mental health. This course begins by exploring resilience at work, defining its importance, and teaching you how to build it. You'll understand the Health & Safety Executive’s stress management standards, the significance of mental health in the workplace, and the difference between pressure and stress. The course also covers recognizing stress warning signs, identifying primary sources of workplace pressure, and understanding the link between pressure and stress, providing practical strategies to enhance your wellbeing and resilience.nThe final modules focus on effective time management strategies, emphasizing prioritization and productivity. You'll learn about the impacts of left and right brain thinking on time management, how to use a time log to optimize your schedule, and how to set and achieve effective goals. By the end of this course, you'll have a comprehensive toolkit to handle stress and manage your time efficiently, ensuring a healthier and more productive work life.

effectivemeetingskills.description_text: Unlock the secrets to conducting meetings that are both efficient and productive. This course starts by addressing common challenges like managing disruptive individuals and keeping participants on task. You'll learn respectful and effective methods to handle disruptions and strategies to steer conversations back on track, ensuring your meetings stay focused and achieve their objectives.nAs you progress, you'll delve into techniques for making your meetings more effective and avoiding time-wasting sessions. The course introduces the MAGIC acronym, a powerful tool to enhance your meeting management skills, ensuring each session is purposeful and result-oriented. You’ll also explore techniques to ensure meetings are productive, understand the DNA of successful meetings, and grasp the critical steps necessary to guarantee their success.nFinally, the course covers the importance of briefings, business rhythm, and the need for more formal meetings as organizations grow. You'll learn how regular schedules for reports and meetings influence the rhythm of a business and the significance of gathering information to make meetings more formal and structured. By the end of the course, you'll be equipped with the skills to run meetings that foster communication, unity, and productivity in the workplace.

buildinghighperformanceteams.description_text: In this course, you will explore a wealth of strategies designed to cultivate high-performing teams. You will begin with foundational concepts in collaboration, understanding basic human needs, and the dynamics of team development. By examining the principles of Tony Robbins and Maslow, you’ll gain insights into what motivates and fulfills team members, enabling you to drive greater engagement and productivity.nnAs the course progresses, you’ll delve into advanced topics such as managing underachieving teams, taking proactive steps in team building, and establishing core values, norms, and behaviors. Learn to create a culture where high performance thrives, ensuring everyone on the team is aligned with the collective goals and vision. Through structured self-evaluation exercises, you'll measure team effectiveness and implement continuous improvements.nnFinally, the course addresses the complexities of team dysfunctions and cross-team collaboration. You'll understand the common pitfalls teams face and how to overcome them, using practical techniques to boost morale, balance control and freedom, and enhance overall team performance. By the end of this course, you will have a robust toolkit to lead your team to new heights of success and cohesion.

communicationskills.description_text: In this course, you'll embark on a journey to master communication skills, starting with the basics and progressing to advanced techniques. The initial modules focus on the art of listening, covering both the importance of attentive listening and practical methods to enhance this skill. You'll learn to interpret verbal and non-verbal cues, maintain eye contact, and adapt your responses to different audiences and situations.nMoving forward, the course explores various aspects of written communication, distinguishing between formal and informal styles. You'll gain insights into the appropriate use of grammar, vocabulary, and tone for different contexts. Additionally, you’ll learn the importance of structure and clarity in formal writing, as well as techniques for effective skimming and scanning during reading.nThe advanced modules delve into complex communication scenarios, including understanding different thinking styles and decision-making processes. You'll explore methods to influence and motivate others, use language patterns effectively, and apply NLP techniques to enhance communication. By the end of the course, you'll be equipped with a comprehensive set of tools to communicate clearly, persuasively, and effectively in any professional setting.

emotionallyintelligence.description_text: Emotional intelligence is a key factor in personal and professional success, and this course offers a deep dive into its essential components. You'll start by understanding the basics of emotional intelligence, exploring how it can positively impact various aspects of your life. From there, you'll learn seven effective strategies to manage your emotions and the emotions of others, setting a solid foundation for further development.nnAs the course progresses, you'll focus on specific areas such as empathy, self-awareness, self-control, and self-motivation. Each module provides practical techniques and exercises to boost these skills, helping you to navigate complex social interactions and improve your leadership capabilities. Enhancing your emotional intelligence will enable you to build stronger relationships, make better decisions, and foster a positive work environment.nnFinally, you'll delve into the critical role of emotional intelligence in today's business environment. You'll discover why it is as important as traditional IQ, and how it can give you a competitive edge in your career. By the end of the course, you will have a comprehensive understanding of emotional intelligence and the tools to apply it effectively in your personal and professional life.

coldcallingandprospecting.description_text: Unlock the secrets of successful cold calling and prospecting with this comprehensive course designed for sales professionals. Through expertly crafted videos, you'll explore the nuances of setting appointments, leaving impactful voicemails, and gaining valuable referrals. Each session provides actionable tips and strategies that can be immediately implemented to enhance your sales process. You'll learn how to open your calls effectively, develop a structured yet natural calling framework, and avoid common mistakes that can hinder your success. Special attention is given to overcoming objections, dealing with gatekeepers, and making your sales scripts sound unrehearsed.nThe course also emphasizes the importance of planning and preparing for your calls with clear objectives to ensure focused and productive sessions. You'll discover the art of social selling and the best practices for follow-up calls, maintaining consistent and meaningful contact with your prospects.nBy the end of this course, you'll have a comprehensive toolkit for cold calling and prospecting, equipped to handle any situation with confidence and professionalism. Elevate your sales approach and achieve remarkable results with these essential training videos.

salesstrategiesandtechniques.description_text: Transform your sales approach with our comprehensive course on Sales Strategies and Techniques. Start with the Consultative Selling PULSE Model, where you'll master positioning your interactions, understanding client needs, and presenting tailored solutions. This section emphasizes becoming a trusted advisor, enhancing your ability to build strong client relationships.nNext, gain a competitive edge by understanding what customers value beyond price, transitioning from salesperson to trusted advisor, and outshining competitors without discrediting them. Learn strategies to engage prospects throughout the sales cycle and analyze sales figures for continuous improvement.nFinally, master the art of handling objections. Redefine objections as opportunities, learn various closing techniques, and address common objections with confidence. Discover proactive strategies to avoid objections and use them to your advantage. By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with advanced sales techniques to improve your performance and achieve better results.

processimprovementandproblemsolving.description_text: In this course, you will master process improvement and problem solving. Starting with the “5 Why” technique, you’ll learn to identify root causes and tackle challenges with precision. The course also covers how to conduct effective brainstorming sessions to generate innovative solutions. You will explore action learning sets and continuous improvement cycles to review and enhance your processes.nAdvanced concepts like the Plan, Do, Check, Act model (Deming Cycle) will be introduced, guiding you through its implementation for ongoing improvement. Practical applications include reducing waste with the TIMWOOD model, managing data effectively, and leveraging technology for process enhancement. You’ll learn the importance of sharing best practices and managing processes to ensure long-term success.nBy the end of the course, you will have a toolkit of strategies and methods to drive process improvement and solve problems in any professional setting. This comprehensive approach ensures you can apply these concepts directly to your work, fostering efficiency and innovation in your organization.

winningatsales.description_text: In this course, you'll embark on a transformative journey to become a top-performing sales professional. Starting with key account management, you'll learn essential tools to streamline and enhance your processes, understand the role and responsibilities of a key account manager, and apply these principles effectively in your sales role.nNext, we focus on the critical aspects of preparation and mindset. You'll uncover techniques to gather information without direct questioning, develop a success-oriented mindset, and organize your selling day for maximum productivity. From managing your state of mind to overcoming the fear of rejection, this section equips you with the mental tools needed for sales success.nFinally, you'll delve into sales interactions and presentations. Learn how to improve your listening skills, build and maintain strong connections, and handle objections with ease. Explore strategies for creating powerful first impressions, engaging your audience, and delivering compelling presentations. Each section is designed to provide you with practical, actionable insights that you can apply immediately to enhance your sales performance.

alzheimersresearchuk.description_text:
Without effective treatments, one in three children born today will die with dementia. Today, there are no dementia survivors but research can change this.

Alzheimer’s Research UK is the UK's leading dementia research charity, dedicated to causes, diagnosis, prevention, treatment and cure. Backed by our passionate scientists and supporters, we’re challenging the way people think about dementia, uniting the big thinkers in the field and funding the innovative science that will deliver a cure.

from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: Big promotions only a bundle away
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Excel Essentials, Winning at Sales, Managing Conflict, Introduction to Sales, Sales Strategies and Techniques, Handling Difficult Conversations, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: The Growth Mindset should be at the forefront of every career-minded individual. With hot courses like Winning at Sales and Managing Conflict—the Humble Skills Hub: Get That Promotion Bundle is a one-stop-shop for go-getters. This 20+ course bundle will give you the knowledge you seek to take your career in sales, marketing, and more to the next level. Take your passion for productivity and growth to a new frontier and help support Alzheimer's Research UK with your purchase.
from_bundle.author: Packt

basic_data.human_name: Humble RPG Bundle: Classic Pathfinder Mega Bundle 2025
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: A world of adventure & danger awaits, and the only thing missing is your heroism. Gather your party of trusty friends for countless adventures with our latest Pathfinder bundle from Frog God Games. Mix up your fun with hot Pathfinder TTRPG campaigns like Adventures in Tehuatl, The Northlands Saga Complete, The Grey Citadel, and more. Get everything you need to embark on an epic high fantasy journey together, and help support Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals with your purchase!
basic_data.description:
Forge your own legends. A world of adventure & danger awaits, and the only thing missing is your heroism. Gather your party of trusty friends for countless adventures with our latest Pathfinder bundle from Frog God Games. Mix up your fun with hot Pathfinder TTRPG campaigns like Adventures in Tehuatl, The Northlands Saga Complete, The Grey Citadel, and more. Get everything you need to embark on an epic high fantasy journey together, and help support Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals with your purchase!

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $2,560. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF format, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

chaosrisingpf.description_text: Completely customizable for any fantasy campaign, Chaos Rising is a classic dungeon exploration adventure designed for four or more characters of at least 10th level. It details an ancient and abandoned dwarven citadel, in which the demonís amulet is hidden, and contains unique encounters in which characters can travel back in time to shape the future itself!

advancedfeats_summonerscircle.description_text:
The Summonerís Circle conjures forth a slavering horde of new feats and behind-the-screen insights into the most complicated and inspired new class in the Pathfinder line up.

Created by Sigfried Trent, this 19-page book includes:

A breakdown of the summoner class

30 new feats for summoners including Cannibalistic Casting, Giant Step, and Unstable Evolutions

A complete character sheet for your summonerís eidolon

Summoner character builds: chess master, mythic rider, and master of arms

Bring out your wild side and summon forth the fun with Advanced Feats: The Summonerís Circle today! And check out the rest of the Advanced Feats series for the other new Pathfinder character classes.

lostloretheembersofdominstowerpf.human_name: Lost Lore The Embers of Domin's Tower (PF)
lostloretheembersofdominstowerpf.description_text: A wizard’s tower explodes. The wizard was well-known for practicing the necromantic arts, as well as performing vile summoning ceremonies that called forth foul beasts from other worlds. Now, the surrounding towns are fearful of what may come out of the smoking remains, but too afraid to wade in and deal with the issue. The Embers of Domin’s Tower is an 8th level adventure for 4–6 characters.

fortheloveofvalentinepf.description_text: A chance encounter connects your party with a charismatic prophet on the lam, and the woman who loves him. Congratulations, youíve stumbled into an epic clash of religions, and you may or may not be on the winning side of that conflict. Sure, you have Love on your side. But they have soldiers, power, and maybe something more. Delivering your guy to safety means winding your way through a crowded city celebrating a raucous festival of fertility, and a race through the countryside, where all is not as it seems.

lostlorejusticarofmuirpf.description_text: The Holy Order of Justicars is the living embodiment of the first and most important of the triune virtues of Muir ó Truth. As an embodiment of truth, and in keeping with the strictness ofMuir, a Justicar of Muir must follow an extremely strict moral code beyond that required of a common paladin. The benefit of this purity and stricture is awe-inspiring. This prestige class is joined by 13 new feats for paladins of all faiths.

journeystothewest.description_text:
Leave the Known Lands Behind!

What lies beyond the western shores of Midgard, past the boundaries of civilization and into uncharted waters? If you believe the old sea legends, brave

explorers will find mysterious islands full of beauty and horror, and rich treasure guarded by unknown gods.

Some say that out there among the waves, a sea-king lies in chains; and a goddess of memory and time weaves dark intrigues that reach everywhereóeven deep

into the lands we know.

Written for the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game, Journeys to the West takes your players on epic voyages of discovery. Within its saltwater-crinkled pages youíll find:

8 lost islands to explore

5 completely new adventures from level 1 to 10

10 new monsters including the coral ooze, dragon eel, and son of Talos

8 NPCs and dozens of adventure hooks

27 new spells to bend time or master the sea, plus 4 new domains and 4 new magic items

Sail beyond the horizon and into undiscovered realms with Journeys to the West!

moondaughtersfatepf.description_text: This adventure is suitable for 4ñ6 characters of levels 5-8 (Tier 2 in 5e) and is located in a fictional, folkloric region of China. Beginning with an encounter with a disguised god, Moon Daughterís Fate brings the characters into the province of Sheng Xi Gui, ìWhisper Valley,î where divine matters have taken a dangerous turn. Alice Peng has crafted an intricate situation based on Chinese folklore that begins with a mystery and can end in various resolutions of a quarrel among gods, with a healthy dose of fighting and mayhem along the way. The playersí skills at negotiation and mysteries are crucial in addition to combat tactics, and at times the charactersí lives may depend upon problem-solving rather than their fighting skills.

northlandsseries3thedrownedmaidenpf.human_name: The Northlands Series 3 The Drowned Maiden (PF)
northlandsseries3thedrownedmaidenpf.description_text: The Drowned Maiden is a adventure for the Northlands Saga setting and is the third adventure in The Long Night of Winter adventure anthology. Like the other adventures in the anthology, The Drowned Maiden is intended to be dropped into a Northlands Saga campaign by the DM/GM at any time or place that is convenient. It is not tied to any particular location other than taking place on or near a seashore.

lostloredivinehunterspf.description_text: Deities, taken as a group, value their followers like a devil values souls. That is, followers are essentially currency and power for those with the divine spark. Unfortunately for most deities, followers possess free will; nothing gets in the way more of the best-laid plans. Most times when a true believer strays, a simple atonement spell ó typically coupled with a suitable quest ó is enough to steer things back toward the deityís favor. Sometimes, though, the offense is so severe an atonement spell just isnít enough. Some offenses are so severe, so drastic, that forgiveness is nigh impossible. The only recourse in these circumstances is to dole out swift and severe punishment. Most of the time, deities are loath to interact directly with mortals. To handle these special circumstances, they have an unusual breed of hunters called the nelíbarzoth. Divine Hunters presents four new monsters, including a CR 22 mythic version, to hunt your infidels; it also presents the GM with rules for creating new versions.

lostloreikiryothelivingspiritspf.human_name: Lost Lore Ikiryo The Living Spirits (PF)
lostloreikiryothelivingspiritspf.description_text: Some people never show their emotions. Perhaps they consider them a weakness enemies can exploit, or they were taught that emotional displays are improper when in public. Sometimes situations arise where powerful emotions must be repressed. Displaying anger at a powerful lady can be dangerous; openly lusting after the ladyís consort could prove deadly. With most people, repression of emotions can lead to stress or even illness ó mental, physical, or both. With some, however, those emotions run deep and hold great power. How does the repressed emotion of a powerful sorcerer manifest itself? What of a young person with the undeveloped potential to be a summoner? Or what if a relatively normal person just dams up a reservoir of repressed emotion, only to have a triggering incident ignite it into life like a tindertwig tossed in a vat of lamp oil? In rare cases, these powerful emotions manifest, arising from a person to take on a life of their own. These are the ikiryo, the living spirits. Guided by the subconscious desires of its progenitor, an ikiryo acts where the person does not, free of its creatorís inhibitions, morals, and reservations. This powerful emotional force is a danger to all it encounters, especially the focus or cause of those emotions, and potentially deadly to those with which it interacts.

northlandsseries6onenightinvalhallapf.human_name: The Northlands Series 6 One Night in Valhalla (PF)
northlandsseries6onenightinvalhallapf.description_text: One Night in Valhalla is a adventure for the Northlands Saga setting and its the sixth and final adventure in The Long Night of Winter adventure anthology. Like the other adventures in the anthology. One Night in Valhalla can be dropped into a Northlands Saga campaign by the DM/GM at any time or place that is convenient. It is not tied to a particular location and be placed anywhere in the Northlandsw that the DM/GM needs for his own campaign.

darkfey.description_text:
Few mortals know how deep the Fair Lands go, or what manner of creatures dwell in its shadows.

These are the strange, wild folk of the old tales: cruel beings who prey on human greed with cursed gold, and invite young men and women to revels from which they never return.

Dark Fey is an essential guide to the fey, usable with your dark fantasy setting of choice.

This 22-page book includes:

An overview of the fey courts, including the River Court, the Moonlit Court and the Court of a Million Stars

18 new malevolent fey, left behind to wreak havoc when elves abandoned the mortal world

A new fey animal template

Known fey of Midgard, organized by type and by CR

Get Dark Fey today, and introduce your players to the truth behind the tales!

sunkenempires.description_text:
Sink a Continent ó Or Survive the Cataclysm

ìA great sourcebook for any Pathfinder game thatís headed below the waves and seeking to explore the sunken realms, be they Azlanti ruins, aboleth cities, or something worse!î

óJames Jacobs, Paizo Creative Director and co-author of Lords of Madness

Sunken Empires is a treasure trove for anyone fascinated with lost civilizations and ancient magic, from GMs who want to place the technology of lost civilizations, run astonishing undersea adventures, expand their aboleth lore ó or just sink an inconvenient continent to players who want more choices for their class, their caster, and their gear.

Sunken Empires supports aboleth-centric, Atlantean, and similar adventures with technology and lore for any civilization, lost or otherwise, and creatures from the Underdeep.

Itís time to go beneath the surface.

Introduction by the creator of the aboleths, D&D designer David ìZebî Cook.

How to Sink an Empire: worldbuilding cataclysms

Weapons and technology of lost empires, from lightning spears to mind paste.

New PC races and classes, including the surprising net fighter and oceanic bloodlines

Spells and magic of the sea, including new domains

New creatures, including coral drakes, drowned maidens, and goblin sharks

DM tools and adventure hooks

Complete Ecology of the Aboleth

Written by Brandon Hodge and Open Design patrons, with frequent review, playtest and feedback to maximize playability. 80 pages.

Open Design is a trademark of Open Design LLC.

Pathfinder and associated marks and logos are trademarks of Paizo Publishing, LLC, and are used under license. See paizo.com/pathfinderRPG for more information on the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game.

advancedraces_tosculi.description_text:
The tosculi are alien beings, operating under a shared consciousness and hostile to all but their hive-mates.

Their cities are run with a ruthless efficiency and ruled by fearsome queens; any who do not conform are destroyed or driven out. Known as the Hiveless, these outcasts attempt to thrive in a world where they are feared and reviled, making their way as best they can.

You are one of these outcastsóthe Hiveless. Now you must make your way in a chaotic world that fears and reviles you.

Advanced Races: Tosculi gives you everything you need to play as a tosculi PC in the Southlands, or any setting. This 14-page sourcebook includes:

Tosculi racial traits, with gliding wings, hardened carapace and latent hive mind

War-Warper and Hivemaster racial archetypes

9 tosculi feats, including Skittering Offense, Stinging Flurry, Waspís Rend, and Wing Fan

New magic items and equipment, including Abdominal Spike, Blinding Powder, Hivebomb, and Rod of the Hive Mind.

That werehyena wonít be laughing so hard after youíve stabbed it in the chest with your ovipositor. Get Advanced Races: Tosculi today and join the Hiveless in search of adventure!

lostloretownofglorypf.description_text: The Town of Glory presents a new rules mini-system for building and growing frontier communities, giving players and GMs multiple options to add onto their existing game play. To keep the town safe, youíll have to be on constant watch for enemies, and there are many in the Windreft. Orc tribes control much of the nearby foothills, hobgoblins camp in the north, boggards infest the waterwoods across the river, gnolls hunt in the open plains, and trolls sometimes wander down from the Green Mountains. And if some scholars are correct, Glory sits right above a mythical subterranean world called the Kingdom Beneath.

seancheslamentpf.description_text: Seancheís Lament (shana-khi) is Frog God Gamesí offering for St. Patrickís Day 2021, an adventure based on Irish and Celtic folklore by Ian McGarty. The Seanche, a legendary bard, has traveled the lands for hundreds of years. This sandbox-style adventure offers a wide variety of challenges and encounters, against a backdrop of legends, tales, rumors, and fey creatures of (at best) ambiguous morality. From the terrifying cave of the Doirche to the Wizardís Weal Tavern, the Giantís Feast, fey courts, and a deadly confrontation in the Hartwood, Seancheís Lament is a picaresque adventure of epic proportion. Fans of Jack Vanceís Lyonesse series and anyone who enjoys Celtic folklore will find themselves right at home in this environment.

siegeofdurgamsfollypf.description_text:
Durgam's Folly sits at the edge of the kingdom, an embattled outpost against the evil creatures of the world. You travel with a caravan to that distant fortress, transporting mysterious cargo. But as you approach your destination, something is amiss. A local hamlet is in ruins. Strange creatures patrol the land. Has the famed fortress finally been overthrown?

The Siege of Durgam's Folly includes maps of the fortress of Durgam's Folly and the chambers beneath. This book details a strange new set of monsters that will plague your campaign for years to come. Can your players learn the dark secrets of this distant fortress? And in the end, will your party discover who or what is truly behind the siege of Durgam's Folly?

lostlorehorsesofthewildpf.human_name: Lost Lore Horses of the Wild (PF)
lostlorehorsesofthewildpf.description_text: While most overland travelers only need use of a generic light or heavy horse as described in the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook, some players might have use for a more exciting animal in their adventures. One that needs protection from theft or destruction. More expensive, yes, but well worth the extra coin. The equines included feature a wide variety of bonuses for a multitude of needs as the player desires. Other riders may want to learn new tricks to make their mounted combat shine. For there are bandits on nearly every road and the wilderness is full of dark and terrible creatures. Having a way to incorporate the mount in battle enables the character to shine.

itstartedwithachickenpf.description_text: First in the Splinters of Faith series of adventures, It Started with a Chicken introduces the player characters to a nefarious and ancient evil. This power plots to reassert itself ages after it was cut off from the world. The beginnings of the resurgence of evil seem minor ...chickens have gone missing in the village of Lessef, and villagers believe the culprit to be a fox. They offer a reward for the fox, dead or alive. But what the adventurers find instead threatens their very lives and the world as they know it!

advancedraces_gearforged.description_text:
Woe to the traveler who treats one of the Gearforged as a mindless automaton!

The gearforged are living constructs: metal forms with mortal souls. Originally created to fight as powerful soldiers, the gearforged must now find their own paths. Some seek knowledge, others divine contemplation. And some seek adventure!

Advanced Races: Gearforged gives you everything you need to play as a gearforged PC in any setting with clockwork creatures. This 26-page sourcebook includes:

12 gearforged racial traits, and 5 gearforged subtypes including Infernal Machines and the draconic Fangforged

7 archetypes including Faithforged, Lawmaster and Heavy Gauntlet Witch

15 gearforged feats including Aquatic Explorer and Constructsí Bane

New gearforged spells, magic items and equipment

New clockwork PC options, skills and regional traits

How to create a gearforged! (In the game. Weíre still working on real-world applications at Kobold World Headquarters.)

With their ticking hearts and minds of brass and magic, the gearforged are a strange new thing in the world. Show it what youíre made of!

eyeofitralpf.description_text: The Eye of Itral is a ìfilm noirî type adventure set in the town of Catís Cradle, written by Ken Spencer. Mysteries and secrets abound, and some of them can be very, very dangerous. This book is intended to be used in tandem with the Catís Cradle Sourcebook (also published by Frog God Games) and includes separate player maps.

halloftherainbowmagepf.description_text: While investigating the disappearance of Londar Brightrain, also known as the Rainbow Mage, the party comes across dark, twisted plans and deadly secrets before locating his famous treasures. Treasures found include several new spells along with a few magic items. Unfortunately, the traps and creatures left behind by Londar hamper the partyís investigation, and other adventurers compete for his famous secrets and treasures.

advancedraces_aasimar.description_text:
Sword of the Righteous!

Aasimar might carry a few drops of heavenly bloodóbut they are warriors and summoners to be rightly feared! For they shall lay down the word of the Law, sinners, and strike down upon the wicked with furious anger!

With celestial power and the unique insight of the divine, the aasimar deliver both a touch of divine grace, and unique insight into how and why great evils might best be destroyed!

Advanced Races: Aasimar gives you everything you need to play an aasimar adventurer from the celestial traditions. This 20-page sourcebook by designer Adam Roy includes:

6 new aasimar racial traits and 4 Mythic traits including Celestial Awareness, Fiery Light of Heaven, Mythic Mark, and Splendor of the Divine

9 new Mythic feats and 4 regular feats, including Adamant Spirit, Greater Smite, Purity of Heaven, and Supreme Celestial Resistance

3 new archetypes: Celestial Rhymer, Celestial Summoner, and Purifier

14 new spells and 2 new subdomains, Angel and Radiance

3 new Mythic magic items and 4 Transcendant Artifacts

An overview of the Aasimar in the Midgard Campaign Setting

And much more!

The celestial chorus calls you to right the wrongs of the worldósmite down demons, speak forth the words of the Law, and bring down your righteous hammer on the unholy!

lostlorecharacterskrelpf.description_text: Whether itís because you were invited to the game at the last minute, your GM just killed off your current ó and favorite ó character, youíre the king (or queen) of procrastination, or whatever other reason, you need a new PC ñ now! And weíre here to help. The Lost Lore Characters line presents a new PC, ready to roll, for you to use at the table. Each character has full stat blocks for levels 1, 5, 10, 15, and 20. Should you need a character of a different level, by all means, feel free to add or subtract levels as needed.

tegelmanorpathfinderrulesaddendumpf.description_text: This book lists the various personalities found in Tegel Manor. The Family Treeís primary function is as a random encounter table. It also doubles as a list of the various magical portraits that may be encountered in galleries and other rooms. Entries are listed with names first, followed by the location of the associated portrait, game stats (general undead stat blocks are provided in APPENDIX II), notes on appearance, tactics, or personality, and the magical effects of the picture. In the case of some NPCs, their lair is also indicated in square brackets.

lostloreschoolsofthoughtpf.description_text: Conjurers summon monsters to fight for them. Necromancers create undead to fight for them. Enchanters corrupt the will of others toÖ make them fight for them. Why are those different? What if, instead, we created a school for wizards who get others to fight for them? Letís call them Lords. This book presents eight new schools of wizardry ó schools defined by what their members want to do with their magic instead of how it works. It treats wizards as people. As members of a larger society who must coexist with others. After all, no one, not even the most powerful wizard, is completely self-sufficient.

catscradlesn.description_text: A walled town of roughly 4000 citizens, Catís Cradle is a modular resource that can be used any time you need a town at the intersection of trade routes. This book describes the important locations in the town and its immediate surroundings, such as the ìsaltî mines formed by the ancient intersection of some massive interplanar beast with the material plane. The otherworldly mineral deposits left behind are used in Catís Cradleís thriving alchemy-related businesses.

playersguidetothedragonempire.human_name: Player's Guide to the Dragon Empire
playersguidetothedragonempire.description_text:
Scales, claws, and elemental dragon magic!

From the coin swarm to the wyvernís sting, this is an astonishing collection of feats, spells, and exotic animals and dragon magic for Pathfinder RPGñready to customize any PC from the exotic lands of the dragon bazaars!

The Dragon Empire region is the exotic land of a conquering Sultana, a land of elemental gods and unstoppable legions. Learn the secrets of this The Players Guide to the Dragon Empire has new options for those who seek adventure and fortune in this exciting realm!

This 30-page collection of materials provides players with a regional overview, plus a wide range of new powers and options for any Pathfinder RPG campaign, including:

New archetypes and prestige class options for Monks, Magus, and Rogues as well as Fighters and Druids, such as Elemental Exarchs, Dragon Magus, and Monk of he Fiery Fist or Wind Palm

Exotic animals from axebeaks to baboon and far beyond

4 Magic Rugs and Carpets from the bazaar, with full magic item and construction writeups

17 new spells for elementalists, sorcerers, and dragonkin

25 new feats and dozens of regional traits

Advice for playing drakes or dragonkin as PCs

An overview of the region, its titles, and heraldic devicesñand the harem assassins!

Pick up the Guide to the Dragon Empire today, and behold its astounding wonders!

advancedraces_derro.description_text:
Stare Into the Void!

Staring into the void, the derro are waiting in their twisted cities to oversee the descent of the world into insanity and destruction. But a few of them seek a wider realm...

The strange little derro are an unlikely choice for player characters (and this supplement provides much fuel for NPC anti-paladins and savants!), but they can be a wonderful change of pace in any underdark campaign or any game with a wide scope.

Advanced Races: Derro gives you everything you need to play one of these subterranean dwarves who has seen too much, starting with derro PCs abilities, culture, quirks, and richly expanded Pathfinder RPG rules. This 19-page sourcebook includes:

Racial stats for lesser and full Derro PCs, plus 8 alternate racial traits from Vermin Speaker to Beloved of Madness

3 extremely metal new spells: Facemelt, Madfire, and Skullsplitter!

Complete Minor Madness tables

5 new racial feats, plus derro gear such as poisoned nets and strange magical items

Includes Age and Weight Tables, plus suggested names for your derro PC or NPC!

3 archetypes including Fist of Madness (Monk) and Shadow Antipaladin, plus the Derro Savant bloodline

It's all here, pick up Advanced Races: Derro today, and see beyond the walls of sanity!

mysteryatravenrockpf.description_text: An investigation leads to dangerous places beneath once-friendly castle Ravenrock. Unknown to all a horror has festered . Defeating the menace that is responsible will neither be easy nor straightforward. Mystery at Ravenrock is an adventure designed for 4th to 7th level characters. It is the self-contained second act of the story begun in Frog God Games' Menace in Ravenreach.

lostloreecologyofthebasiliskpf.human_name: Lost Lore Ecology of the Basilisk (PF)
lostloreecologyofthebasiliskpf.description_text: Ecology of the Basilisk takes an in-depth look at this creature of legend, proffering its potential genesis, special physiology, and psychology. New spells, feats, and magic items aid characters in their hunt against the stone-creating lizards, along with suggestions on how to use existing feats and spells to the player's advantage. The GM, too, has new options, including an advanced mythic basilisk and rules for a naturally awakened basilisk ó a new monstrous class progress that awakens the basilisk, giving it frightening intellect and allowing the GM to challenge her players in new ways.

lostlorestaffofthewaterspf.human_name: Lost Lore Staff of the Waters (PF)
lostlorestaffofthewaterspf.description_text: This reddish staff is made of acacia wood, having a few slight bumps or bulges but with a very smooth nish. It is strong and solid and thick enough to ward off blows. One end is slightly narrower, the other is a little wider, blunted, and shod in bronze. Numerous symbols representing water, rivers, frogs, water snakes, and more are engraved around the bronze cap. Once the staff of a powerful magician, it has been passed down in a family for generations and is the source of stories of this ancestor possessing ultimate mastery over water and possessing the ability to cross bodies of water ó even oceans according to legend ó without getting wet. One does not need to be a wizard or a spellcaster of any type to wield the Staff of the Waters, but it is more likely that such a person would choose it. Anyone could use it as a melee weapon, but it takes more than merely possessing it to be able to unlock its other powers.

tehuatlsn.description_text: Born of blood and treachery, the island of Tehuatl is all that remains of a once-mighty empire that dominated an entire continent. Inspired by the history and legends of Mesoamerica, this new addition to the World of the Lost Lands introduces you and your players to a land and a people reborn from a devastating cataclysm who persevered and created their own legacy built upon stone, wood, and flesh.

talesoftheoldmargreve.description_text:
Put out the fire, shoulder your pack, and enter the deep woods...

Tales of the Old Margreve contains 8 eerie forest adventures for the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game in a unique Old World setting inspired by the medieval folktales and superstitions of Eastern Europe.

Here in the Old Margreve Forest, heroes trek past crumbled griffon towers, over stiles and shepherdsí fields, to where the lonely road thins and branches under the dark canopy of the trees. Deep in the forestís misty hollows, you may hear the rusalkaís song rising over the crackle of a midnight fire or glimpse the white flash of a deer centaurís tail as it vanishes between the trees.

In this place, those who ignore the old ways are never seen again.

Inside youíll find:

8 adventures for player characters of 1st to 10th level

Dozens of Margreve sites, inhabitants and adventure hooks

12 unsettling new monsters

New spells and incantations

Unexpected powers wielded by the living forest itself!

Whether you choose to take your players into the legendary forest between the realm of the vampire knights and the clockwork city of Zobeck, or cherry-pick its contents for your own campaign world, Tales of the Old Margreve will challenge your players to earn a place in fireside tales.

Written by Tim and Eileen Connors, Richard Pett, and Open Design patrons, with frequent review, playtest and feedback to maximize playability. 112 pages.

ìa contender for Best RPG product of the year and on par with the first Forgotten Realms or Ravenloft box set. Yes itís that good.î

ó

Review by Fame & Fortune

menaceinravenreachpf.description_text: Menace in Ravenreach is an adventure for a party of 4th-7th level characters. When the group of adventurers arrived in the outpost town of Ravenreach they headed directly to the local tavern. As was usual, it took under an hour until fists started flying, glassware shattering and furniture flying. The fighting ended, just as the last of the locals melted away. Their incarceration made the wanderers the ideal candidates for an unusual errand. The Master Minder, the court wizard, requires the capture of a local troll ñ alive ñ for his studies. Without hesitation, they accepted the task and into the wilds they went. Not exactly a start to a Saga of old, but the days are young as they slip into the dark woods.

catandmouse.description_text:
In the cool streets and blazing bazaars, the word is out: a great treasure has gone missing in the Everlasting City of the Cat, and some very ambitious people have set their sights on it. Many paws and claws are out, and everyone is sniffing around for something rich and strange.

Itís an odd time for a catfolk thief and a gnoll merchant to make very tempting offers to strangers in town. Or, perhaps itís not odd at all. Get caught up in the hunt with Cat and Mouse by Richard Pett, the acclaimed Paizo adventure path author!

This Pathfinder Roleplaying Game adventure for 1st-level characters is a perfect introduction to the Southlands campaign setting, and it fits neatly into any desert city where cats are sacred and rats are cautious and sly.

(A poster map of the city of Per-Bastet is also available via DriveThruCards.)

journeys_piratesofthewesternocean.human_name: Journeys: Pirates of the Western Ocean
journeys_piratesofthewesternocean.description_text:
Create fantastic ships with new construction templates, or roll up a distraction between ports with random tables.

Youíve explored the Western Ocean from Barsella to Terminus Island, but youíll never truly experience it until you raise the Jolly Roger and strand law at the shore. Come join the ranks of pirates plying the shipping lanes, and make your own rules out on the high seas.

Any pirate-minded GM will find something useful in these pages:

Unleash 3 pirate bands and new ports of call

Explore 2 new adventure-packed islands on the Western Ocean

Deploy 13 personalities to assist or hinder your party on their next adventure

Pit your party against Thalassic creatures serving the Sea Titans

Discover 11 new spells, and the secrets of ancient aboleth glyphs

Learn new feats and liberate new magic items from the unworthy!

Plunder this sea-chest of ideas to fuel your own high seas adventures!

Pick up your copy of Pirates of the Western Ocean, and set sail for riches!

tehuatlplayersguidepf.description_text: This product gives players and GMs spells, equipment, and magic items designed for the Tehuatl expansion to the World of the Lost Lands campaign setting. However, you are free to incorporate the resources contained within these pages into any section of the Lost Lands or any other world of your choosing.

greycitadelpf.description_text:
In the city of Dun Eamon, demons roam the streets, criminals rule the night, and an important local power figure has gone missing. Can your heroes unravel the clues that lead through every social element of the city--from the heights of the Grey Citadel to far below its streets and even into the hearts of its inhabitants? Or are some mysteries better left unsolved?

The Grey Citadel is a mini-campaign of urban detective work and dungeon exploration designed for four or more characters of 5th level. Set in a rain-soaked, rough-and-tumble frontier city. The Grey Citadel offers numerous colorful NPCs, a richly unique location, new monsters, and magic items -- plus enough plot twists to provide hours of role-playing and door-kicking adventure, where your wits must be as sharp as your swords.

scentsandsensibilitiespf.description_text: Scents and Sensibilities is a three-part resource for those who choose to challenge their players with the foul-smelling monsters known as stank hogs. The first section is a short adventure called The Manufactory of Fumario (suitable for 4ñ6 characters of level 1-3), and the second section is an erudite discussion of the stank hog (Sus noxium). The third section contains statistics for adult and young stank hogs.

lostmenageriepf.description_text: Lost Menagerie is a challenging adventure for characters of 7th to 9th level. They say favors make the world go around, and itís true of the planes of existence beyond material reality as well. In the distant past, the great wizard Arfaleo the Seeker claimed favors from four mighty elemental lords to create a self-contained world.
